name: Reginald A. ROBERTS, petitioner, v. Risa Vetri FERMAN, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Reginald A. ROBERTS, petitioner,
v.
Risa Vetri FERMAN, et al.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until February 13, 2017, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
casebody.head_matter:
Reginald A. ROBERTS, petitioner,
v.
Risa Vetri FERMAN, et al.
No. 16-6895.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 23, 2017.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until February 13, 2017, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
